Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, north of the Regalia Convent.
Room.LongDescription: The outer yard of the Regalia Convent lies to the south of Hillcrest Drive, surrounded by a white fence of wood. Looking over the fence, you can see a large, grassy yard where a number of nuns and other religious figures are walking about the yard enjoying the day's sun. The entrance to the Regalia Convent is located to the west off of Marina Way.
